about_the_game:
How to play

Read on by clicking on the screen, and the ending will branch depending on your choices.
The ending branch is determined by the choices you make at the end of the story, so you can complete the ending without stress.
There is also a scenario chart, so rereading is easy.

About Stray Memoria

"Stray Memoria" is a reboot work that inherits the characters, some settings, and scenarios from the free novel game "Invisible" and the shareware "Invisible Blue Fragment."
Although it is a reboot, the scenario, CG, and sounds have been updated, and the storyline is different, so both those who played before the reboot and those new to the game can enjoy it.。

Synopsis


Hathanashi is a town where an urban legend is popular: anyone who sees another doppelganger of themselves will die within a week due to a curse.
The main character, Tsugumi Kisaragi, who has lost her memory, is cursed by a doppelganger and meets and forms a cooperative relationship with a friend who has the ability to see invisible supernatural beings and the supernatural ability that is the very state of her own mind.
In the midst of battles with monsters that threaten their peaceful daily lives, supernatural users who target people with abilities, and friends who have gone out of control, the protagonists grow as they face their own problems and clash with their friends.

※Compatible with Japanese only

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains some scenes including "slightly revealing swimsuits" and "bathing".

  • Processor: IntelCore7　相当以上
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A contemporary juvenile mystery about young boys and girls who grow up confused and troubled, and adults who harbor secrets.
